enbun_intro.h1: WEB 3 Data Solutions in the Real World
enbun_intro.h3: Enbun allows flexible interchange of NFT membership cards and points issued at stores with those issued at other stores.

product_intro.h3: Checks has created an economic data engine by integrating each step of NFT membership card transactions.

feature1.title: NFT Membership Card System
feature1.desc: Various series and levels of NFT membership cards can be issued, and points accumulation rates and promotion rules can be set for each level of membership card. The contracts for these membership cards are publicly available on the blockchain network and exist permanently.

feature2.title: Encrypted Electronic Receipts
feature2.desc: All transactions using NFT membership cards are encrypted with the user's private key and stored on the blockchain network. Due to the use of private key encryption, data can only be managed by the consumer.

feature3.title: Decentralized Information Bank
feature3.desc: We provide a decentralized data bank for consumer data analysis and trend platform, utilizing LMM (Large Language Model) technology to enable data retrieval using natural language. This data can be used in-house and sold to companies in need of their data.

company_intro.h3: All of Checks, Inc.'s staff come from excellent companies in Japan and China.

guoyu.name: Guoyu
guoyu.title: Founder
guoyu.desc: The founder of Checks, Inc., Guoyu, was the 473rd employee of ByteDance (the parent company of TikTok). He is a serial entrepreneur. After the company he co-founded was acquired by ByteDance in 2014, he worked as a senior technical expert for 6 years and then started a business in Japan in 2020.

arakawa.name: Syuhei Arakawa
arakawa.title: BD Partner & Consultant
arakawa.desc: Additionally, the Senior Product Manager previously served as a Senior Product Manager at ByteDance and OnePlus, while the designer and development engineer come from the production company of the popular Chinese app 'Jike'.

others.name: Employees
others.title: Additionally, the Senior Product Manager previously served as a Senior Product Manager at ByteDance and OnePlus, while the designer and development engineer come from the production company of the popular Chinese app 'Jike'.
